adql.query.operand

Class Concatenation

  • java.lang.Object
    • adql.query.ADQLList<ADQLOperand>
      • adql.query.operand.Concatenation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ADQLObject, ADQLOperand, java.lang.Iterable<ADQLOperand>

    public final class Concatenation
extends ADQLList<ADQLOperand>
implements ADQLOperand
    Represents a concatenation in ADQL (ex: "_s_ra" || ':' || "_s_dec").
    Version:
    1.3 (10/2014)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (CDS;ARI)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class adql.query.ADQLList

        ADQLList.ADQLListIterator

      Builds an empty concatenation.

      • Concatenation

        public Concatenation()
        Builds an empty concatenation. To add operands, use the "add" functions.
